pages.text: Requirements: $(li)Altar at equal or above 128 Blocks height $(br)$(l)OR$()$() $(li)8 Marble Blocks $(li)16 Jade Tiles $(li)4 Indented Gold Blocks
An example of how the ritual can be placed if placed below height level.
By putting the Altar high in the air, you can harness the very winds and the sky to power your magics.
